articles.title: Current political climate spurs efforts to 'reclaim' MLK holiday - Politico
articles.description: Activists worry American society has taken steps backward in recent years.
articles.content: The fatal shooting this month of an unarmed Minneapolis woman in her car by Immigration and Customs Enforcement agents sent there to target the citys Somali immigrant population, as well as Trump rec… [+5710 chars]
